channel.title: Error while adding drops
channel.description:
Yo,
When im trying to add these drops: [code]//Steel Dragon npcdrop = 1592 536 1 100 npcdrop = 1592 536 1 100 npcdrop = 1592 536 1 100 npcdrop = 1592 536 1 100 npcdrop = 1592 7604 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 9341 6 4 npcdrop = 1592 1540 1 80 npcdrop = 1592 4119 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4121 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4123 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4125 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4127 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4129 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4131 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4151 1 6 npcdrop = 1592 139 1 18 npcdrop = 1592 139 1 6 npcdrop = 1592 2577 1 13 npcdrop = 1592 4827 1 4 npcdrop = 1592 868 50 20 npcdrop = 1592 4675 1 10 npcdrop = 1592 1377 1 6 npcdrop = 1592 1149 1 6 npcdrop = 1592 4087 1 6 npcdrop = 1592 4585 1 6 npcdrop = 1592 6577 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 8002 1 1 npcdrop = 1592 13655 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 8120 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 8130 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 7398 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 7399 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 7400 1 3 [/code]
I get this error,when i run my server [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2038) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:548) at server.main(server.java:114)[/code]
My code is too big, because when i make it smaller, i dont get this.
I have looked at, NPCHandler.java Server.java Npcdrops.java
Mabye i have to change the 45, but where :confused:
,Thanks ~DPreborn

item.title: Error while adding drops
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Access the array with a legal index.

Read full topic

item.title: Error while adding drops
item.dc:creator: @DPreborn DPreborn
item.description:
@DPreborn wrote:

[quote="_™, post:5, topic:288588"]This is your problem:

“[This error is] Thrown to indicate that an array has been accessed with an illegal index. The index is either negative or greater than or equal to the size of the array.”[/quote]

So what could i do against it?

@Mitko, Yes that will work, but then i deleted all my drops.
Thats why.

@ Zyle1992 I tried that, but i still get it

Read full topic

item.title: Error while adding drops
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

Mitko:

This has happened to me once, i think it’s cause you give too many drops to 1 npc, try to remove and leave like 3 and then test.

Read full topic

item.title: Error while adding drops
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Maybe. I can’t remember if it’s 100 items for each Npc, or if it’s 100 items total. try changing the 100 to a 200 for Items[], and ItemsN[]. Maybe that will work.

Read full topic

item.title: Error while adding drops
item.dc:creator: @DPreborn DPreborn
item.description:
@DPreborn wrote:

zyle1992:

Check your Npcdrops.java and see what the [] is for drops. For mine it’s 100, but yours might be smaller.

I have looked, and it is 100.
I have to change it higher?

item.description:
@DPreborn wrote:

Yo,

When im trying to add these drops: //Steel Dragon npcdrop = 1592 536 1 100 npcdrop = 1592 536 1 100 npcdrop = 1592 536 1 100 npcdrop = 1592 536 1 100 npcdrop = 1592 7604 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 9341 6 4 npcdrop = 1592 1540 1 80 npcdrop = 1592 4119 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4121 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4123 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4125 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4127 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4129 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4131 1 15 npcdrop = 1592 4151 1 6 npcdrop = 1592 139 1 18 npcdrop = 1592 139 1 6 npcdrop = 1592 2577 1 13 npcdrop = 1592 4827 1 4 npcdrop = 1592 868 50 20 npcdrop = 1592 4675 1 10 npcdrop = 1592 1377 1 6 npcdrop = 1592 1149 1 6 npcdrop = 1592 4087 1 6 npcdrop = 1592 4585 1 6 npcdrop = 1592 6577 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 8002 1 1 npcdrop = 1592 13655 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 8120 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 8130 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 7398 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 7399 1 3 npcdrop = 1592 7400 1 3
